definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The ROK will work with China to cope with the international financial crisis, he said.
sentences.chinese: 韓方將同中方共同努力，應對國際金融危機。

sentences.english: The island has a large military garrison.
sentences.chinese: 島上有大量的韓方駐軍。

sentences.english: Mr. Wi Sung Lac, chief of the ROK delegation to the Six-Party Talks came to visit China today.
sentences.chinese: 六方會談韓方代表團團長魏聖洛今天來華訪問。

sentences.english: The ROK side will jointly push for all-round development of bilateral relations with China.
sentences.chinese: 韓方將與中方共同推動兩國關係繼續全面發展。

sentences.english: The joint mission by the ROK side of 14 and 10 U. S. experts.
sentences.chinese: 聯合調查團由14名韓方人員和10名美方專家組成。

sentences.english: Does China agree with the investigation result?
sentences.chinese: 是否認同韓方調查結果？

definition: to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
One-China principle, the official doctrine that Taiwan is a province of China
Edward Snowden (1983-), American surveillance program whistleblower
